computation.name: Resolution of the heat equation with homogeneous Dirichlet boundary conditions

computation:
* Domain: Square :math:`[0, 1]\times[0, 1]` meshed by triangles. * Reference solution: :math:`(T, X, Y)\mapsto \exp(-T)\sin(\pi X)\sin(\pi Y)`. * Operator: Heat operator :math:`\partial_t u-\Delta u`. * Boundary conditions: Dirichlet condition on the whole boundary with data automatically computed. * Right-hand side: automatically computed. * Initial value: automatically computed. * Time scheme: explicit (or forward) Euler scheme. Parameters have been chosen to obtain a stable numerical simulation.
